General.Name: Arich Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Arich Enterprise Co., Ltd. provides medical sales and promotion, and logistics services in Taiwan. It promotes prescription drugs and over the counter products in drug stores; and medicines to specific specialties in hospitals, clinics, and drug stores. The company also conducts public seminars, promotional activities, long-term educational program, RTD meetings, in-store displays, anti-counterfeit activities, and medical seminars; and offers channel coverage, inventory control system, order follow-up techniques, and market research analysis. Further, the company offers various supply chain services, including international bond, registration, hospital pricing service, warehouse management, transportation and distribution, account receivable management, information linkage, and drug price submission; logistics services consisting of inventory control, quality control procedure, GMP, and bonded warehouse storage; and value-added services, such as re-labeling, temperature-controlled delivery, handling of returned goods/disposable items, batch-tracking management, customer complaints handling, and delivery systems. The company serves medical centers, area hospitals, district hospitals, and general practitioners, as well as chain stores and hyper markets, drug stores, and wholesalers. Arich Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.880, Zhongzheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23586
